description:
SEO Checklist: Differentiate Yourself & Win More Web Design Business by Presenting This Completed 12-Point SEO Checklist To Clients.

Win More Business & Increase Your Web Design Fee

✔ DOWNLOAD & USE the SEO Checklist

✔ Learn how to manage clients expectations for your SEO work

✔ Find & Resolve Technical Errors Blocking Rankings & Sales

Once enrolled, you'll also have access to myself, an experienced SEO expert, so you can get feedback, advice and support as you complete the lectures.

You Don't Need SEO Experience Take This Course

No previous SEO knowledge is required to carry out any of the 12 actions listed on this SEO checklist. We won't cover all SEO work which requires specific knowledge of the customer such as keyword research, building backlinks etc. I'll also show manage expectations and make clear to the client what SEO work you are doing/not doing.

Content & Overview

Using the most up to date SEO tools and criteria, I'll walk you through each point on the SEO checklist, explain why it's important for SEO and show you how to complete the action.

This course is designed for anyone who wants to win more web design business and increase their fee by proving to the client the are building a SEO optimised site.

Whether you're a beginner, intermediate or want a refresh as advanced, this training will help your grow your business (or future business!) with SEO.

Stand out from the crowd. Enrol today to win more web design business by learning how to make SEO optimised websites.
title: SEO Checklist to Increase Your Web Design Fee
